CustomField.formula: 'When there are ' + TEXT(LogEntryNotificationMatchCount__c) + ' or more matching LogEntry__c records, send ' + IF( IsEmailNotificationEnabled__c , BR() + ' - An email notification to ' + EmailRecipient__c, '' ) + IF( IsSlackNotificationEnabled__c , BR() + ' - A Slack notification to ' + SlackChannel__c + ', using the named credential ' + SlackNamedCredential__c, '' )
CustomField.label: Summary
